data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Tishechkin, Dmitri Yu. (2013): Taxonomic study of Central Asian species of the genus Macropsis Lewis, 1836 (Homoptera: Auchenorrhyncha: Cicadellidae: Macropsinae). I: Redescriptions of willow-dwelling species from West Tien Shan Mountains. Zootaxa 3722 (4): 581-595, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3722.4.8
